rationale: Although Aphyosemion georgiae has a relatively limited distribution, it is listed as Least Concern because there are currently no threats known to the species, it inhabits a relatively remote and undisturbed area, in which some parts are protected and receiving conservation attention.
assessor: Moelants, T., Snoeks, J., Laleye, P. & Contreras-MacBeath, T.
evaluator: Snoeks, J., Collen, B., Darwall, W.R.T., Ram, M., Smith, K. & Allen, D.J.
